EmailTemplate.description: Are You Benefitting from Online Grocery Sales?
EmailTemplate.name: eCommerce Freshop Campaign.11-16-21 RET eCommerce Freshop Campaign Phase 2 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Adapt to the New “Normal” of Grocery Shopping
EmailTemplate.textOnly: In the U.S., online grocery shopping reached nearly $90 billion in sales in 2020, an increase of more than $30 billion. Viewed as a novelty for most of us before 2020, grocery eCommerce is here to stay. Here’s the thing: It’s not just massively convenient for shoppers: retailers reap the benefits of expanding operations to meet demand—and that’s not all.
